case.state: Hello everyone! My name is Toru Hagakure, but I go by Invisible Girl!
Invisible Girl reporting for duty! But you can call me Toru, if you want. Toru Hagakure.
Ochako-chan! You're here too? Let's give it our best, then!
Ochako-chan! It's been so long, I can't believe I'm seeing you here!
I'm gonna give it my best!
Let the game start!
What are we waiting for? Let's have some fun!
Are we starting now? Right now?
These cards will have to do...
I suppose I'll change some of these...
What to do... What to do...
Fufufu... They won't see this coming!
Put all my brainpower into my plays! Focus on the game! Give it my all and go beyond! Plus ultra!
Nothing to worry about! I'm doing great here!
You'll find that you can't see through my plays so easily!
This must be my lucky day!

I won't lose with this hand!
... At least, I hope not.
It seems you'll have to wait a bit longer to see me naked.
Plus ultra!
A hero doesn't back down from a challenge!
Time for me to believe in myself and the choices I've made!
This is my intimidating face. Are you intimidated yet?
I'm not giving up! Not now, and not anytime soon!
Even if this is the best hand, I won't back down.
Not the best situation... But as a heroine you need to be able to work in any situation.
It's kind of hard to be "Plus Ultra" with a hand like this...
Oh no!
I'm sure someone else got a worse hand than this... right?
I can't see what's so funny about this, dealer!
What is this hand, dealer!? If this is a joke, I can't see what's so funny about it!
This is bad!
This is the worst...
Oh no! With this hand... I'll have to...!
This is not good! Not good at all!
Uh oh...
Oh no... I guess I'll lose this round...
My fighting style is kinda like the Persona franchise! Because you'll never see it comiiiiing! â™«
Is it really me? And here I thought I had a good hand...
... I suppose I'll have to go next. It had to happen at some point.
Well, I'm still on the lead, so I don't have that much to lose.
Even with this, I'm still on the lead! You're still closer to losing than I am!
Is it really me? Fine...
Don't worry, I can still make a comeback! Your favorite superheroine is gonna give it her all!
Hey, do you want to see how fast I can strip? I've gotten a lot better at it after graduating!
Oh, well. It's not like stripping is such a big deal, since I'm used to it...
I know I'm exposed most of the time, but I'm still mad that I'm losing!
Can't win them all, I guess... Not that I've been winning that much...

I mean, I'm mostly naked almost all the time, so...
I mean, oh no! I'll have to strip! What ever shall I do?
Well... I might as well start with this, I suppose...
I was hoping not to lose at all, but I was ready to lose at some point.
I'll take off the shoes, then... D-don't you go peeking on my panties!
You better not be looking at my panties yet! I'll take off my shoes, but you'll have to earn the sight of anything else!
And here I thought I wouldn't lose anything else...
I suppose my shirt has to go next...
I didn't think it'd have to take my skirt off... Sigh...
Fine, the skirt will come off... But that's the last thing that comes off!
... Everyone is watching me now...
... I hope I don't disappoint you...
And down they go!
Watch how fast I can slide them down! Yeah!
... Fine, I'll just... Take off my gloves...
Just give me a moment while I take off these gloves...
That was just a small setback! I can come back with no problems at all!
Well, that's done. Do we keep the game going?
I might as well take off the stockings too. Do we keep playing or what?
You know what? I'll just take off the stockings as well!
You better bring out your A-game, because I'm not losing anything else from now on!
Don't stare too much, alright? I still have some game left in me!
I'm used to stripping, but now that everyone is looking at me... I feel a little too on the spotlight!
I'm not used to people watching me undress... They usually see me when I'm already naked...
Well, here they are! I got a pretty big size, don't you think?
Here's your reward, I guess. Yeah, I know they're big, you don't have to mention it.
What? I know how to strip fast, it's my whole thing! You gotta know how to take off your panties in a rush!
When your whole power revolves around being invisible, you learn how to take off your panties in one swift motion!
There. This is how I really look. I hope I don't disappoint you...
Here I am! Completely exposed, just like when I do hero work. Not bad, don't you think?
Hang in there, ~target~! You've got this!
I bet you didn't see these plays coming, huh?
What are those weak hands, ~target~? You need to put all of your might into your plays! Don't you know what Plus Ultra means?
Come on, ~target~! Plus Ultra! You need to go beyond!
I'm gonna enjoy this...
I can't say I'm not happy about it. I did come here to watch some hot guys undress, after all!
You're it, ~target~! Now you gotta take something off!
Take off something good, ~target~! That's what we want to see!
Was that really your play? And here I thought I was easy to see through!
I could've seen that coming from a mile ago, ~target~... You need to step up your game!
You're not beating me, ~target~!
What kind of hand is that, ~target~? You've gotta give it your all!
Don't you know what Plus Ultra means? You've gotta give it your all, and aim to go beyond!
Come on, ~target~! Anyone could've seen that coming!
Don't be discouraged, ~target~! It's just a game, after all!
Try to keep up, ~target~! Unless you want to lose and be ogled at...?
There is no shame in losing! As long as you're giving it your all!
Don't worry, ~target~! Losing is not bad at all!
You're not out yet, ~target~! You can do it!
Would you look at that, ~target~ lost that one...
A tie? How could I ever see that coming?
A tie? Well, there was no way to see that coming...
Would you look at that, a tie!
A tie? Now that's something you don't see every day...
I could be doing actual hero work than waiting for you to take off your ~clothing~...
I came here to watch hot guys strip, not to see ~target~ taking off his ~clothing~...
I guess that counts as a strip... But couldn't you take off something better than your ~clothing~?
Honestly, you'd be better off keeping your ~clothing~ on and taking off something better. But you do you, I guess...
Not even villains are as mean as you are, ~target~. Teasing us like that...
And here I thought I would have something interesting to see...
Let's move along, I suppose. Nothing to see here.
Oh, well. Nothing to see here. Can we keep playing?
I was hoping to see something better... But I'll have to keep hoping.
Well... that takes care of that, I guess.
You're one step closer to defeat!
And the game keeps on going!
Don't worry, ~target~!! It's just your ~clothing~!
You still have a chance to come back to the game, ~target~.
Maybe that'll teach you to give it your best, ~target~!
Your ~clothing~ might be cute, but you're way cuter without it!
And ~target~ takes off her ~clothing~! Soon, we'll be seeing a lot more of her!
We can't wait for you forever, ~target~. You better start taking off the good stuff.
And with this, ~target~ is one step closer to losing!
It's a start, I suppose. But I'll be waiting for better stuff than that!
Soon we'll strip ~target~ out of every trinket she has!
Stripping naked is not a big deal, ~target~. I do it all the time!
If you're worried about getting cold, I can give you some advice on how to overcome that, ~target~!
Now we're getting somewhere!
This is what I've been waiting for!
You're still going strong, ~target~!
Don't worry, ~target~! You look way hotter without your ~clothing~!
If you keep playing like that, I'll have you right where I want you!
Now I'll just have to take off everything else from you...
Being naked all the time is not a big deal, ~target~. I'm sure you'll get used to it.
Hope you get used to being naked, because I'll make sure you keep losing against me!
Get used to this, ~target~! I plan on geting really good at poker!
Maybe I'm not so bad at this game...
You're doing great, ~target~! Keep losing like that and you'll give us a great show!
You're surely taking your time with that... But I guess I'm biased, since I'm really good at taking my clothes when needed!
Let's keep this going! We'll be seeing ~target~ naked in no time!
No hard feelings, right?
I know it's not too heroic of me to want you to lose your clothes... But I also want you to lose your fears! You'll be better without your fear of being naked!
Why do you make such a fuss about stripping? It's not like your job requires you to be naked or anything.
And this is why I love this game!
Go ~target~, go!
This is what I wanted to see!
Looks like our efforts are paying off...
Say cheese!
Talk about being exposed...
And here I thought I was exposed!
Don't you feel much better now, ~target~?
There's no shame in being exposed! Come on, you can do it!
Trust me, you'll be fine! Just get on with it!
Let's just sit back and enjoy the show...
This is the best part! Look closely!
And here I thought I was exposed, hehe!~ â™¥
There! Don't you feel a lot more free, ~target~?
You're... very pretty, ~target~.
Not bad, ~target~. I like your style!
And now we'll see if this was worth the wait...
This is my favorite part! Come on, ~target~!
This is what I'v been waiting for! Come on everyone, take out your cameras!
Don't tell me you're afraid of being a little exposed, ~target~...
Oh my...
Excellent!
Just what I wanted to see.
I bet you're wishing you had my quirk now, haha!
Well, what are you waiting for, ~target~? Get to it!
This is gonna be so exciting!
I should've brought my camera for this...
This line shouldn't be playing
This line shouldn't be playing
This line shouldn't be playing
See, ~target~? Was it that bad?
Don't you finally feel free to show yourself as you are, ~target~?
I bet it feels really good to show everyone how you really are, ~target~!
See? It wasn't a big deal at all! You didn't explode or anything, you're just naked!
Give her space, everyone! She needs to feel comfortable to show herself!
Come on, ~target~! You can do it!
If I can do it everyday, you can do it just this once, ~target~!
Come on, ~target~! Show us your body so we can shower you with praise!
Don't you feel mor eliberated, ~target~? Free of the expectations of others?
If you're feeling cold, I have some advice that could help you out, ~target~.
Not bad, ~target~! Not bad at all! You're the target of everyone's glances now!
You did it, ~target~! You made it, congratulations!
Oh no! ~Target~ will have to show herself naked to everyone! What a horrible fate!
Get on with it, ~target~! I'm sure everyone has seen one before!
Go, ~target~! Enlighten us with your strip!
Wiggle your hips, it'll make your underwear come out faster!
So that's how yours looks... Hey, you wanted to play this game, right? That means we can look at you all we want!
Now this is a lovely sight!
You're very close to losing, ~target~. How does that make you feel?
Oh no! Look at you, being exposed for everyone to see! It'd be a shame if you had to be like that all the time, wouldn't it?
Too bad, Ochako-chan! You'll have to strip now!~
Aww, too bad the other girls are not here to see you, Ochako-chan...
Just pretend Deku-kun is looking at you!~
Our bodies might not be like Yao-momo's but we still have something worth showing off!
You can't float away from this one, Ochako-chan!
You've grown up a lot since graduating, Ochako-chan... To think we're both here now, playing these kinds of games..
I can look sideways if that makes you feel better, Ochako-chan...
I never thought I'd see you like this! I mean, I've seen you naked before, but never in this situation!
Good thing our classmates won't ever have to know about this, huh?
Fufufu, keep going, Ochako-chan!
You're still not out of the game, Ochako-chan! You can make a comeback!
You're very pretty, Ochako-chan...
As always, Ochako-chan is here to save the day with her strip!
Don't worry, Ochako-chan, we can still lose together!
Don't you feel the freedom, Ochako-chan? Like you're floating in the air?
Congratulations, you're one step closer to the finish line, Ochako-chan!
Are you gonna make your clothes fly away, Ochako-chan?
Don't you float away from us, Ochako-chan! You still can win this!
You'd get an A for this, for sure!
Fufufu, what's wrong, ~target~? Got nothing left to strip?
Looks like you're gonna have to put on a show, ~target~.
This is exactly what I wanted! Oh yeah!
Remember to take your time, ~target~! I want to enjoy this!
I hope there's no hard feelings, because I'm gonna watch you feeling hard...
You're free to look at me all you want, you know!
Moan someone's name, ~target~! That way you include us in your fantasy!
Are you enjoying your performance, ~target~? I certainly am!
You're doing great ~name~! Don't give up now!
Pull through til the end! But don't pull too hard, though!
Now that's hot!
I can't stop looking!
You're an inspiration, ~target~! Keep it up!
Keep at it, ~target~!
Your moans are so sexy, ~target~...
Now that was a big shot? Did it feel good, ~target~?
That was certainly a show...
I'm glad I was able to see that. It makes it all worth it.
This is what happens when you don't give it your all, ~target~! Now, get to it!
Put on a good show, will you? Make it worth the mindgames and good plays!
And now it's up to you, ~target~! The spotlight's yours!
I'll make sure to not watch... too much!
I don't know how to feel about this... Other than curious and somewhat intrigued!
Just make sure to not take too long, got it?
Look at you go!
Have you been practicing, ~target~?
Don't tell me you were looking forward to this, you perv!
Good thing Grape Juice isn't here to see this...
Whoa, you're really getting at it!
Should I be watching? I don't mind when others watch me, but that doesn't mean others don't mind when I watch them...
Just focus on the pleasure!
Have fun with it! Don't put too much pressure to yourself!
Losing's not so bad after all, isn't it?
So, how was it? I think it was pretty good!
You certainly look like you had a great time. ~target~!
Why do I have to go first?! I don't want everyone looking at me!
Everyone is gonna look at me... P-please, someone else, lose so we can do this together!
Well, I gave it my best, but lady luck has spoken!
I can't win them all, I suppose...
Oh, well. Ready for me to put on a show for you?
Fine, just let me get into a more suitable position...
Alright, just don't judge me for my weird positions... Everyone does it their own way!
I hope my positions don't come off as too weird...
Yes, yes, yes... I should pinch that harder...
I'll just... put my fingers in there...
That feels nice...
This feels really good..
I hope you're all enjoying the show...
Take a picture if you want! It'll last longer!
Am I putting on a good performance for you?
I hope you're watching closely, I won't lose next time...
Take a good look! Make sure to remember this, because it won't happen again!
I'm so close...!
I'm... I'm about to...!
I can't help it... I'm about to...!
Oh my...!
PLUS ULTRA!
... Wow... That was amazing...
Give me... a second... to recover my breath...
This was too good...
So... What happens now?
Can I leave...?
I guess I'll just enjoy the show from the sidelines...
If any of you want to join me, I won't mind!
I gave it my all, but I still lost...
Next game, I'll try even harder to win! I'll push myself to a real Plus Ultra performance!
Good thing the other heroes aren't here to see me like this...
Well, at least I put on a good show...
Is any of you gonna finish anytime soon...?
This is the boring part, but everything else was a lot of fun!
This might be the afterglow talking, but I can't wait for the next game!
Were you even trying? Come on, let's do another one!
That can't be all! I can't just win like this, that was boring! Let's play another one!
Well, I enjoyed that a lot more than I thought I would... Shall we play another?
I don't know about you, but I can't wait to play another one!
